    #

    simple mutable assign

    function assign () {

  var args = [].slice.call(arguments).filter(function (i) { return i })
  var dest = args.shift()
    # 
      args.forEach(function (src) {

    Object.keys(src).forEach(function (key) {
      dest[key] = src[key]
    })
  })

  return dest
}

module.exports = assign
